item.description:
I'm meeting-up with some other people and we're dancing, come join us!

You'll be able to get wristbands for drink specials from 10pm-12am (ask for one from the cashier, tell them you're with the party for "Jocelyn Milliman").  $3 for draft beer, house & call drinks, & house wine.  As a special, there will be no cover charge. 

If you're a "Maybe", please note that in your RSVP

If you're interested in dinner, text me.  We have around 7 people going to Geronimo's.

The music at Wicked Wolf normally seems to be about like what you'd hear on 101.3 FM.


HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP. You should probably text, since it's a noisy club. If you're arriving after 10, try to text before you arrive. If I'm in back dancing and have a bad signal I may not even see your text until I wander to the front sometime.

I'm somewhat tall, 6'3", which may help in locating me.

PARKING: I always find free street parking easily northeast of the green...Temple St, Grove St, etc. Or look at New Haven's out-dated parking garage map here:

http://www.cityofnewhaven.com/ParkingAuthor...
item.name: Fri. 1/6 - Dancing at Wicked Wolf; drink specials, no cover. Dinner @Geronimo's
